results.title: Spring ball [Widescreen]
results.brief_description: At the Annual Senior Citizens Spring Ball another woman is named Spring Belle. Over the course of the evening, memories of friends lost as well as the lives that they’ve led will be shared. A powerful short film shot in Wagga about ageing with dignity and the era of Spring Dances and all they encompass. (Awards: Voted most popular Australian Short Film, Sydney Film Festival, 1993)

results.title: Spot goes to the farm
results.brief_description: Six fabulous stories featuring Spot, the world’s favourite puppy. 1. “Spot goes to the farm” - Spot and his dad, Sam, visit a farm to find some baby animals. 2. “Spot stays overnight” - Spot stays overnight with his friend, Steve the Monkey, and almost forgets to take his teddy bear. 3. “Spot makes a cake” - Spot helps his mum Sally to make a cake for a fair. 4. “Spot goes to the park” - At the park, a friendly frog helps Spot find his ball. 5. “Spot finds a key” - Where does the key fit? Spot sets out on a search to discover the answer. 6. “Spot in the garden” - Spot has lots of fun helping his dad with the watering and mum with the vegie garden. Based on the book by Eric Hill.

results.title: Spills Happen
results.brief_description: A lively and realistic video training program, demonstrates spill response and clean up procedures in comprehensive step by step detail. Beginning at the moment a spill happens, the program takes viewers through the process of identifying, reporting, containing, cleaning up and decontaminating the spill. The program demonstrates three spill scenarios of different severity: an environmental contaminant; a highly toxic acid spill; and a medium flammable spill. A complete training program designed for all employees who work with hazardous chemicals or respond to spills.

results.title: Spider & Rose = Spider and Rose
results.creator_credit: Bill Bennett, Graeme Tubbenhauer, Lyn McCarthy and Dendy Films
results.brief_description: Ruth Cracknell, Simon Bossell and Max Cullen star in this tender human comedy. Spider McCall is an ambulance driver with a bad attitude. On his last day he lands the assignment from hell, driving Rose Dougherty to her birthday party in a distant country town. Rose is an eccentric 70 year old with an attitude probem to rival Spider’s. During their journey they discover a rare friendship amidst laughter, love, adventure and danger. Max Cullen won an AFI Award for his portrayal as Jack, a bee-keeper trying to win Rose’s affection. Stay tuned for the credits as a little story unfolds during them.

results.title: Spider-man: the new animated series
results.creator_credit: Various, Adelaide Productions and Mainframe Entertainment
results.brief_description: Modernised, highly amusing and very cool animated series about Spider-man, aka Peter Parker, focusing on his college years, as he tries to study, make sense of his love life, earn a living and keep the streets crime-free as a super-hero. This is the entire first series and the episodes include: Heroes and villians; Royal scam; Law of the jungle; Sword of Shikata; Keeping secrets; Tight squeeze; Head over heels; The Party; Flash memory; Spider-man disabled; When sparks fly; Mind Games Part 1 & 2. This is the first completely computer generated “Spider-man” and features the voices of Neil Patrick Harris, Lisa Loeb, and Ian Ziering. Based on the Marvel comic book character created by Stan Lee and Steve Ditko.

results.title: Spiceworld: the movie
results.creator_credit: Bob Spiers, Barnaby Thompson, Uri Fruchtmann and Fragile Films
results.brief_description: A thriller with a little romance and a lot of comedy, “Spiceworld” chronicles the five crazy days leading to the Spice Girls’ first live concert at the Royal Albert Hall. Photojournalists follow as they travel from press conferences to practice sessions to photo shoots, passing London landmarks in the comfort of their tardis Spicebus and emerging into a musical cascade of colour, trendy clothes and blinding flashbulbs. Exploring the trials and tribulations of their global fame, “Spiceworld” takes a satirical stab at the media giants and commercial junkies who relentlessly compete to manufacture the girls’ success or demise. Cast includes The Spice Girls, Richard E. Grant, Alan Cumming, George Wendt, Claire Rushbrook and Roger Moore.

results.title: The Long Tomorrow
results.creator_credit: Dan O'Bannon and Les Humanoïdes Associés
results.brief_description:
Colour printed copy of comic book ‘Moebius - The long tomorrow’, by Les Humanoides Associes; hard cover edition. 56 pages, 21.2 x 29 cm , colour edition
ISBN 9782731673845
results.description: The Long Tomorrow is the title of a science fiction comics short story serialised in two segments in the French magazine Metal Hurlant in 1976. It was written by Dan O’Bannon, and illustrated by Moebius. It is noted for its influential visual design, which inspired the designs of feature films including Tron, Alien, and The Abyss.
description_for_label:
Colour printed copy of comic book ‘Moebius - The long tomorrow’, by Les Humanoides Associes; hard cover edition. 56 pages, 21.2 x 29 cm , colour edition

results.title: Spheres
results.creator_credit: Norman McLaren, Rene Jodoin and National Film Board of Canada
results.brief_description: A play on motion, against a background of multi-hued sky. Spheres of translucent pearl seem to float weightlessly in the unlimited panorama of the sky, grouping, regrouping, at times colliding like some stylised burst of the atomic chain reaction. Set to the music of Bach, played by pianist Glenn Gould. (Awards: Cordoba)
